name: BIG O with LITTLE TRIANGLE
description:
Two friends named BIG O and LITTLE TRIANGLE.

These two friends should help each other to complete the level.

They can't win the game without each other

The idea of This game comes from " The missing piece meets the big o " by Shel Silverstein.

the gameplay of the game is: you should use the LITTLE TRIANGLE to jump through holes

and then use the magnet power of BIG O  to grab the  LITTLE TRIANGLE and finish the level.

and the music is by our friend Mahyar Kalantar Pour

and the programming is by my friend Farzad farzane 

the game is incomplete but better than not to submit
